short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop buying stuff you don't need. Donate instead to highly effective charities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It’s surprisingly cheap to save literal human lives when you donate to charities that do the most good per dollar.  Put your cart to better use.

How does the app work?
When you go to check out on your favorite shopping site, we’ll not-so-subtly remind you to consider donating instead to one of a couple highly effective charities by letting you know how much good your money can do.

What if I'm buying essentials?
No judgement here.  Even for those who can afford it, we know it's not realistic to donate instead of buying most times you shop.  All we ask is that the next time you go to check out with a squirrel hand puppet in your cart, you'll consider putting those dollars to better use.  

Why so few charity options?
Not all charities are created equal.  We base our featured selections off of the extensive research of organizations like GiveWell and The Life You Can Save who recommend only charities that have a proven track record of doing the most good for your buck.   

Which shopping sites does the app work on?
Right now just Amazon, but we're working on adding more.
